component.name: URW Gothic
component.summary: An alternative font family for ITC Avant Garde Gothic typeface

description.p: This sans-serif font family is an alternative for the ITC Avant Garde Gothic typeface, and is part of Level 2 Core Font Set - PostScript specification of 35 base fonts that can be used with any PostScript file.
These 35 base fonts are provided freely by (URW++) company, and are mainly utilized by Ghostscript, or other applications using it.
